title: Radiant Diamond and Pearl Chandbali Jhumkas
materials: Natural Pearls. Features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring luster.
features: Intricate filigree detailing frames the Chandbali design. Features floral and paisley (manga) motifs. The arrangement of diamonds in a pavé setting enhances the shimmer. Suspended gold balls (gundu) add traditional movement. Green pearl centre piece adds a touch of colour
colors: Soft Green Pearl and gold gundu.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranti and Ugadi
or any grand celebration. A timeless choice for muhurtham ceremonies and upscale gatherings.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, these Chandbali Jhumkas represent the epitome of South Indian jewelry artistry. The diamonds sparkle brilliantly, complementing the warmth of the gold and the serenity of the pearls. They are a testament to tradition with a touch of modern elegance, designed for the discerning woman.
